item.title: NHL Predictions - February 26, 2020
item.description: These predictions are created using an ELO Model. More information on my methodology is coming in a future post. Table 1: NHL Predictions - February 26, 2020 Game Probability Away Team Wins Probability Home Team Wins Buffalo Sabres @ Colorado Avalanche 37.1% 62.9% Pittsburgh Penguins @ Los Angeles Kings 60.7% 39.
